name: Hoichi
description:
This game was made as a part of HakJak Studios' 2023 HakJam event. Made in 4 days, this game is one of many from the talented folks over at HakJak. More information about the studio can be found here: https://www.hakjak.com/.

There may be some issues with the level geometry. That's just the way the cookie crumbles with a game made in 4 days by 1 person.  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
